name: LD50[Delay the Inevitable]--job at METeA
description:
A game made by Kiseki1911 and Wangdapaooo.

This is a game about a pure human selling drinks for a company in a cyberpunk era. Can he survive from being fired?（No, we do not fire people in our game.) In a time where machines are superior than human, can he still be himself or is he going to upgrade into cyborg just like everyone else? Maybe there’s no option. It’s for you to find out!
